bibl.title: Le cave del Mons Claudianus: conduzione statale, appalti, e distribuzione.
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: D.P.S. PEACOCK and V.A. MAXFIELD, with contributions by Olwen WILLIAMS-THORPE, Ian C. FREESTONE, Janet LANG, Wilfried VAN RENGEN, R.S. TOMBER, R.S. THORPE †, A.G. TINDLE and M.C. JONES, Survey and Excavation. Mons Claudianus 1987-1993. Volume I: Topography & Quarries (Le Caire, 1997).
